title: Introduction to React
description: Create a simple React application that demonstrates the use of components, props, and state.
instructions: Build a small React application that includes at least 3 components. Use props to pass data between components and implement state management for at least one interactive feature. Submit your code as a GitHub repository link.

title: Data Structures Implementation
description: Implement a linked list and binary search tree in JavaScript.
instructions: Create JavaScript implementations of a singly linked list and a binary search tree. Include methods for insertion, deletion, and traversal for both data structures. Write tests to verify your implementations work correctly.

title: Database Design Project
description: Design a relational database for a library management system.
instructions: Create an ER diagram for a library management system that tracks books, members, loans, and returns. Implement the schema in SQL and include sample queries for common operations like checking out a book or finding overdue loans.

title: Machine Learning Classification
description: Implement a classification algorithm on a provided dataset.
instructions: Using the provided dataset, implement a classification algorithm of your choice (decision tree, SVM, neural network, etc.). Train your model, evaluate its performance, and write a report explaining your approach and results.

title: Mobile App UI Design
description: Design a user interface for a mobile fitness tracking application.
instructions: Create wireframes and high-fidelity mockups for a fitness tracking mobile application. The app should include screens for user registration, activity tracking, goal setting, and progress visualization. Submit your designs as Figma or Adobe XD files.

title: Network Security Analysis
description: Analyze network traffic and identify security vulnerabilities.
instructions: Using Wireshark, capture and analyze network traffic on a test network. Identify potential security issues and recommend mitigation strategies. Document your findings in a comprehensive report.
